thread.title: Sonam Kapoor Shared An Adorable Video With Alleged Boyfriend, Anand Ahuja
thread.title_full: Sonam Kapoor Shared An Adorable Video With Alleged Boyfriend, Anand Ahuja

title: Sonam Kapoor Shared An Adorable Video With Alleged Boyfriend, Anand Ahuja
text:
facebook 533 SHARES 
The news of Varun Dhawan finally accepting his relationship status with Natasha broke the Internet last night (read here !). And it looks like Sonam Kapoor followed his lead. On her Instagram account, she posted a funny video of herself with rumoured boyfriend, Anand Ahuja. In the video the Neerja actress is seen performing the famous hang-a-spoon-on-your-nose trick, while an impressed Anand laughs. 
Not just this, even the caption for the video was a quote by the man himself! It read - "Everything will be great. Better than great. Just, sometimes, a step back gives perspective and allows for more steps forward - Anand Ahuja @anandahuja #everydayphenomenal." 
Take a look at this cute moment!
